synopsis.text: Toukai Teiou, a cheerful and talented horse girl, has captured the imagination of racing fans across Japan with her pursuit of the prestigious Triple Crown title. If she succeeds, Teiou will be the first horse girl since the legendary Symboli Rudolf to win three major Grade 1 races - the final test being the Japan Derby. As a member of the popular Team Spica, Teiou has racked up multiple victories already. However, taking the Triple Crown will be no easy feat, with both old rivals and new contenders standing in her way. Teiou must overcome immense challenges on the track, while also confronting difficult decisions that could alter the course of her career. All of Japan watches in eager anticipation as their rising star enters the critical Japan Derby, the decisive race of her Triple Crown quest. Though the stands are packed with fans and the stakes could not be higher, Teiou remains cheerful and determined. Her exceptional speed and spirit just may be enough to propel her into the history books, cementing her legacy alongside her idol. The track has been set, the scene is ready - now it's time to see if Teiou can fulfill her destiny as Japan's next Triple Crown Champion!
synopsis.author: anthropic.claude-v2:1
